means: 使恢复，使振作( refresh的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 莱蒂出现了，她重新上过妆。
他醒来感到彻底恢复了精力。

sentence.Network_en: The long sleep had refreshed her.
sentence.Network_cn: 一场酣睡使她重又精力充沛。

entry.tran: 使精神抖擞;使精神振奋;使重新充满活力
entry.def: If something refreshes you when you have become hot, tired, or thirsty, it makes you feel cooler or more energetic.

example.ex: The lotion cools and refreshes the skin...
example.tran: 这种润肤液凉爽清新，能够焕发肌肤的活力。

example.ex: They had stopped by a spring to refresh themselves.
example.tran: 他们曾在一处泉边停歇休息。

entry.def: If you refresh something old or dull, you make it as good as it was when it was new.

example.ex: Many view these meetings as an occasion to share ideas and refresh friendship...
example.tran: 许多人把这些会面看成是交流想法和保持友谊长青的机会。
莱蒂出现了，她重新上过妆。

entry.def: If someone refreshes your memory, they tell you something that you had forgotten.

example.ex: Allow me to refresh your memory...
He walked on the opposite side of the street to refresh his memory of the building.
example.tran: 他走在街的对面，努力回忆这座建筑的原貌。

entry.def: If you refresh a web page, you click a button in order to get the most recent version of the page.

example.ex: Press the 'reload' button on your web browser to refresh the site and get the most current version.
example.tran: 点击网页浏览器上的“刷新”按钮来刷新页面，显示最新的版本。

auth_sentence.content: I emerge from the work refreshed and less depressed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I emerge from the work refreshed and less depressed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I emerge from the work refreshed and less depressed.

auth_sentence.content: Gore refreshed himself with a long sip of tea.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gore refreshed himself with a long sip of tea.
